resources.string:
"When entering the Game screen, you will see underlines which represents the word you are trying to guess.

Take a guess by clicking on a letter.
If the letter exists, it will show up on all possible places in the "invisible" word. If the letter does not exist, the hangman will be incremented and you will be one step closer to losing.

Each time you guess a letter, the letter disappears - meaning you can't guess the same letter again.

The hangman will be incremented in the following order: head, body, arm, arm, leg, leg and dead."
You guessed the correct word! Play another 2 Player game?
You have guessed every word in this category. Do you want to choose another category?
